name: Plane 21
description:
Plane 21

Welcome. Your plane is ready, the route you need to go is clear. Fly your plane and fly to the skies.

Plane 21 is a simple Arcade/Shooter game. You have to fly through the air clearing your enemies. There may be other planes that sometimes send you help. Do not forget to receive these aids. Don't let your enemies cross the border and stay in the air as long as possible.

Plane 21, was developed in 1 day. It may continue to be developed and receive minor updates. Thanks for playing.

You can find my other games on my profile
Samet Can ÜLKER - itch.io

Screen size :

Left Click : Windowed

Right Click : Fullscreen

Translation: Google Translate.
